description:
With the Dragon Balls gone and his plan in ruins, Frieza unleashes his fury upon Vegeta, Gohan, and Krillin.  Elsewhere, the newly-revived Piccolo finds himself on Planet Namek.  Will his arrival be enough to turn the tide?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saikyou Senshi no Tanjou ka!? Nail to Piccolo ga Gattai
Será que surge um novo guerreiro!? Piccolo e Nail se unem
สุดยอดนักรบกำเนิดขึ้นแล้ว!? เนลและพิคโกโร่รวมร่าง
最強戦士の誕生か!? ネイルとピッコロが合体
